transcript:
Customer: [Unintelligible] parayunne.
Halo.
Ma'am just be on call. Halo.
Executive: Halo didi.
Customer: Ma'am just be there over the call just give me one second ma'am.
Executive: Ha okay okay okay.
(silence)
[Unintelligible] vakkham alle parayande. Ningal onnu innale entho vakkham paranjirunnu. 
The person you are speaking with has put your call on hold. Please stay on the line.
The person you are speaking with has put your call on hold. Please stay on the line.
(silence)
Customer: Halo.
Executive: Halo ha.
Customer: Yeah shubha Mrs. Sumaiya is over the call only. I think the call got disconnected in between. Yeah.
Executive: Halo ma'am.
Customer: Ha yes.
Ma'am namakken two months inde ullile refund chodikkal mathrame aanu namukku refund cheyyan pattum. Athu kooduthalai ma'am.
Executive: Adhe.
Customer: Namal ithu eduthappo. Alla ningal paranjathu moonu maasam ennanu. Njangalkku nalla ormayundu. Athu kondanu njangal ithu irupatham theeyithinde ullile irupatham theeyithinde ullile njangal ithu nirthi mean ozhivakkanam ennulla oru scheme il njangal ethiyathu. Kaaranam allenkil njangal munne shramikkunnallelo. Ippo ningal njangale vilichittum ithakkunnilla. Message ayachittu mail ayachittu reply tharunnilla. Angane undallo ithu kaanikkunne. Appo ningalkku ariyam ithu ethra kaalathinte ullila refund cheyyaan enn. And you are playing us with us you know.
Executive: Angane alla.
Customer: Just not playing yeah. Aaa angane illa. Ippo ningal connect cheythirikkunna team vannittu no idea ayirunnittanu. Njangal ippo Chennai il ninnanu ningalodu samsarikkunnathu. Appo avaranu ippo inganathe ma'am issues okke face cheyyarundu. Malayali executive aanennanu parayunnathu. Ingine vilichu samsarikkan thanne paadilla. Pakshe njangal ningalkku vendittanu njangal ningalepole cross call cheythittu approval okke vaadichittu ini njangal follow cheyyendulla reethiyil approval vaadichittundu. No idea teamil eduthu. Appo avaranu ippo inganathe ningal follow cheyyendathu vannittu prashnam njangalkku change aakki koduthirikkunnathu.
Executive: Ma'am prashnam English il samsarikkan prashnam onnumilla. No idea teaminodu vilikkan parayu. Njangal three months ningal paranjathaanu. Three months inde ullil engilum namukku refund cheyyaam ennu paranjukondanu nammal aa oru plan edukkanulla kaaranam. And we are like back off cheyyunnathum three months undennu paranjukondu mathramanu. Appo ma'am athu aa no idea teamine onnu handover cheythittu njangal samsaricholam.
Okay ningal English comfortable aano?
Customer: Aa yes yes.
Executive: Avaru parayunnu.
Customer: That was my mom. Ma'am inu athra English vashamilla. Athinte prashnamanu.
Executive: English comfortable aanennu njaan samsarikkam.
Sir aapko sunai de raha hai kya?
Customer: Haanji haanji.
Executive: Mai shishak subha bol rahi hu shishak.
Customer: Haan haan shubha batao mai sun raha hu.
Executive: Ma'am ne bola tha aise ki vo English me comfortable tha na. Aapne kyu unko.
English me kya hai?
Customer: Ma'am ningal English il comfortable aanennille paranjathu.
Yes let me tell you something like that was my mom.
Like she is not she isn't comfortable with English but I am comfortable with English okay.
So you can tell me.
Executive: Okay okay just wait ma'am one second. Sir ma'am sir the client is saying that she was actually comfortable with English as well.
Then why you.
Oh she is comfortable in English as well.
Customer: Yeah but why didn't you give us that.
Executive: Actually like the last I think from the past 15 days we are we were trying to connect with her every time I think ma'am was picking up the call and she was only telling us please Malayalam Malayalam and this was the reason we are not able to communicate even I asked this I can send texting as well the client was clearly basically only Malayalam only Malayalam and other than these words I was not able to understand even a single word. So definitely if she is comfortable with English we can.
Customer: Ma'am kekkunnundo ma'am? Aa yes which means like I am working in Kozhikode okay. So when I come to home I can communicate with you.
Executive: Oh that's great ma'am. That's my mom actually she can't communicate in English.
That's the problem.
What is your good name ma'am?
Customer: Latheetha.
Executive: Sangeetha.
Customer: Latheetha.
L a d w d e.
L a d L a d w d a and I have like I have mailed you saying that you can contact me in this number.
Executive: Oh oh perfect. Let me let me write down your number and going forward we will be communicating with you.
Customer: Aa okay that will be good.
Executive: Your voice is breaking actually.
(silence)
Customer: Is it fine now?
Yeah is it it is breaking actually.
Executive: One second ma'am I think there is some issue with the Jio network. I hope it is audible now.
Customer: Ha yes it's audible.
Executive: Yeah so ma'am I am just writing your number.
Your number.
Customer: Okay 999.
Executive: 999.
Customer: Ha 999.
Executive: 999 542.
Customer: 542 1987.
Executive: 198 87 ha yeah.
87 L A D W D A.
Customer: Yeah L A D W D A D A yes yes yes.
Executive: Okay so Latheetha like going forward my team will be connecting with you regarding all the services and everything which we are handling from IndiaMART and I hope now the the concern is okay and it is it is resolved now.
Customer: The concern is not resolved like we want to refund the amount. I mean.
We don't want to continue within the month.
And first and for the very first time you said that you said like there will be a period of three months.
Executive: What?
Customer: There will be a period of three months like a trial period or something and if we we can if we want to back off we can back off from that three months only. So in that like we.
Executive: So you are saying if in three months you if you want you can back off.
Customer: Yeah yeah you told me like that yeah.
Executive: So you have any communication?
Customer: What?
Any proof of contact.
I will communicate with my ma. I don't know actually like let me. Latheetha I am telling you I am seeing your product line I see there is like good business opportunity over IndiaMART and if you devote some time and if we coordinate parallelly I am sure like you can understand IndiaMART is a public listed company we are a profitable company and we have like gained good business. So if you like obviously I mean business is all about ups and down and I cannot commit you that yes within three months or within four months you will definitely get the business. Our job we are a matchmaking platform and our job is to create a platform where we can do this matchmaking of the right right buyer with the right seller. This is our job right and we can because conversion is not in our business is also not in our end we are responsible to provide you relevant by leads and this is what we will be working from here onwards.
Customer: Sir I got it all but the problem is like my mom doesn't know English. So she cannot come doesn't know English or Hindi so she cannot communicate with the the people other than like Kerala. So it is a huge problem for her. That's the problem we like back off backing off yeah.
Executive: We will have to find out some solution. Like you have already provided your number going forward my team will be and I I would suggest let's do one thing Latheetha let's do one thing. Can you come over a video meeting tomorrow?
Customer: I am working you know I am working from 9 to 8. So that I don't have that much yeah 9 to 8. So that I don't have that much time for that that's the problem you know. I understand all the things you have said or like you know you convey but the problem is she cannot understand Hindi or English or any other language so that it is so difficult for her. That's the problem. Like dealing with people is so difficult like only mean if we deal with people you know there will be sale only you know. You have to communicate we have to like motivate our like divert them to them into our business you know. She cannot do that. It will be a language barrier that's the problem.
Executive: So so I understand let's let's do one thing Latheetha let's do one thing. Let us try to coordinate I mean my we will do one thing we will be sharing you some by leads over WhatsApp we will create a group where you don't need to connect with every buyer we will be sending you some set of by leads where you can connect from your end whenever you get the time okay and I am sure even if we follow that you will see the I won't say the conversion will happen or I cannot guarantee that but I am sure wherever we are as of now we will be in a better position for sure.
Customer: Sir can I call you back after 10 minutes? I am in urgent situation. 10 minutes 10 minutes I will call. 10 minutes. I am in police station actually. Okay I will call you.
Executive: Okay okay okay okay let let me connect with you after 15 minutes okay. I will call you on this number which you have shared okay.
Customer: Okay okay thank you.
Executive: Okay.
summary:
Concerns:

- Wants refund for the subscription amount.

- Difficulty communicating due to language barrier.



Resolution:

- Executive took customer's number for future communication.

- Executive assured to share buyleads on WhatsApp.



Next Steps: 

- Executive will call after 15 minutes.



Alert (If Any):

refund

@@@Sentiment:

- Angry -> Neutral



@@@Key Topics:

- refund, language barrier, buyleads, subscription
